overview:
About QArea

QArea Inc. is software development outsourcing company, that works for the US and European markets. QAreaâ€™s specialization is offshore information technology outsourcing services, QA and testing services and PDA & Mobile application development. Having its headquarter in Beverly Hills, California, QArea Inc. has its offshore development center in Kharkiv, Ukraine. The company provides services in web application development, mobile development and offshore software testing (”Bughuntress QA Lab”). QArea team includes about 200 employees from different professional areas.

History

QArea Inc. was founded in 2001 by its founder and CEO Max Garkavtsev. At that time QArea was mainly in the most fast growing IT sector and market - Mobile & Wireless. The company had met a considerable business growth on the period 2001-2005 years and by 2006 was already providing wider range of services from several fields including:

  • Mobile & Embedded (C++, Java (J2me); WAP);
  • Business applications (.NET, Java (J2EE); Web 2.0);
  • e-Business applications: CRM, eCommerce, B2B portals (PHP);
  • QA / QC / Testing Lab.

In 2006 QArea also started the process of patenting a new approach to the solution of establishing TCP/IP connection between a server and various Windows Mobile OS devices.

QArea was an organizer and a sponsor of Mobile Monday Ukraine - international community of mobile industry professionals. The first session of Mobile Monday Ukraine was held in Kiev in September 2006.

In 2008 QArea became a Microsoft Certified Partner and this partnership had been continuing during further years. In 2011 QArea became Microsoft Gold Certified Partner.

QArea Services:

  • Web development;
  • Software Testing;
  • Java development;
  • Mobile Development;
  • Custom applications development.
